scripts.dev:electron: bun run transpile:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.build: bun run setup-plugins && tsc -b && vite build
scripts.dist:mac-arm64: bun run transpile:electron && bun run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64
scripts.dist:mac-x64: bun run transpile:electron && bun run build && electron-builder --mac --x64
scripts.dist:win: bun run transpile:electron && bun run build && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.dist:linux: bun run transpile:electron && bun run build && electron-builder --linux --x64
scripts.dist:business:mac-arm64: cross-env BRAND=business bun run transpile:electron && cross-env BRAND=business bun run scripts/write-brand-info.ts && cross-env BRAND=business bun run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64 --config electron-builder.business.json
scripts.dist:business:mac-x64: cross-env BRAND=business bun run transpile:electron && cross-env BRAND=business bun run scripts/write-brand-info.ts && cross-env BRAND=business bun run build && electron-builder --mac --x64 --config electron-builder.business.json
scripts.dist:business:win: cross-env BRAND=business bun run transpile:electron && cross-env BRAND=business bun run scripts/write-brand-info.ts && cross-env BRAND=business bun run build && electron-builder --win --x64 --config electron-builder.business.json
scripts.dist:business:linux: cross-env BRAND=business bun run transpile:electron && cross-env BRAND=business bun run scripts/write-brand-info.ts && cross-env BRAND=business bun run build && electron-builder --linux --x64 --config electron-builder.business.json
scripts.dist:bio:mac-arm64: cross-env BRAND=bio-research bun run transpile:electron && cross-env BRAND=bio-research bun run scripts/write-brand-info.ts && cross-env BRAND=bio-research bun run build && electron-builder --mac --arm64 --config electron-builder.bio.json
scripts.dist:bio:mac-x64: cross-env BRAND=bio-research bun run transpile:electron && cross-env BRAND=bio-research bun run scripts/write-brand-info.ts && cross-env BRAND=bio-research bun run build && electron-builder --mac --x64 --config electron-builder.bio.json
scripts.dist:bio:win: cross-env BRAND=bio-research bun run transpile:electron && cross-env BRAND=bio-research bun run scripts/write-brand-info.ts && cross-env BRAND=bio-research bun run build && electron-builder --win --x64 --config electron-builder.bio.json
scripts.dist:bio:linux: cross-env BRAND=bio-research bun run transpile:electron && cross-env BRAND=bio-research bun run scripts/write-brand-info.ts && cross-env BRAND=bio-research bun run build && electron-builder --linux --x64 --config electron-builder.bio.json
